channel.title: 508 skills!
channel.description:
hey all im using pally's blank source
end i wanne know how to add skills
i realy want the combat skills working if u know it plz tell me
i hope this pic helps cuz i sa on alot of server that they had a map called skills
[img]http://i582.photobucket.com/albums/ss266/runestory_0/naamloos.jpg[/img]
thank you

item.title: 508 skills!
item.dc:creator: @tessa_pk tessa pk
item.description:
@tessa_pk wrote:

sonicforce41:

um… look at players folder and search skill 0-23or 24 depending if you want summoning. or why can’t you just add ::master

i know but i wanne add combat skill that i can train them
like att/str/def that i can train them on players end npc till 99
